00013 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC( CAutoArrivalDlg, CDialog )
00014 
00015 BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP( CAutoArrivalDlg, CDialog )
00016     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_AUTOARR_CHK_ENABLED, OnBnClickedEnabled )
00017     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_TIME, OnEnChangeEditBox )
00018     ON_EN_CHANGE( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_DISTANCE, OnEnChangeEditBox )

00028     (
00029     CWnd                * aParent,

00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 void CAutoArrivalDlg::DoDataExchange
00052     (
00053     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00054     )
00055 {
00056     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00057 
00058     DDX_Check( aDataExchange, IDC_AUTOARR_CHK_ENABLED, mAutoArrivalEnabled );
00059     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_TIME, mMinimumStopTime );
00060     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_DISTANCE, mMinimumStopDistance );
00061 }

00063 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 BOOL CAutoArrivalDlg::OnInitDialog()
00070 {
00071     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00072 
00073     mAutoArrivalEnabled = TRUE;        //doesn't have to be checked, looks better though
00074     UpdateData( FALSE );
00075 
00076     return TRUE;
00077 }  /* OnInitDialog() */

00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void CAutoArrivalDlg::OnBnClickedEnabled()
00088 {
00089     UpdateData( TRUE );
00090     if( mAutoArrivalEnabled )
00091     {
00092         if( mMinimumStopTime != "" && mMinimumStopDistance != "" )
00093         {
00094             GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00095         }
00096         else
00097         {
00098             GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00099         }
00100         GetDlgItem( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_TIME )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00101         GetDlgItem( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_DISTANCE )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00102     }
00103     else
00104     {
00105         mMinimumStopTime.Format( _T("") );
00106         mMinimumStopDistance.Format( _T("") );
00107         UpdateData( FALSE );
00108         GetDlgItem( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_TIME )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00109         GetDlgItem( IDC_AUTOARR_EDIT_DISTANCE )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00110         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00111     }
00112 } /* OnBnClickedEnable() */
00113 
00114 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 void CAutoArrivalDlg::OnEnChangeEditBox()
00121 {
00122     UpdateData( TRUE );
00123     if( mMinimumStopTime != "" && mMinimumStopDistance != "" )
00124     {
00125         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00126     }
00127     else
00128     {
00129         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00130     }
00131 } /* OnEnChangeEditBox() */
00132 
00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 void CAutoArrivalDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00142 {
00143     UpdateData( TRUE );
00144     if( mAutoArrivalEnabled )
00145     {
00146         mCom.sendAutoArrival
00147             (
00148             _ttoi( mMinimumStopTime.GetBuffer() ),
00149             _ttoi( mMinimumStopDistance.GetBuffer() )
00150             );
00151     }
00152     else
00153     {
00154         mCom.sendAutoArrival( INVALID32, INVALID32 );
00155     }
00156     OnOK();
00157 } /* OnBnClickedOk() */
